运行库问题

1.-ltermcap

ubuntu:apt-get install libncurses5-dev
centos:yum install ncurses-devel

2.64位机上编译32位目标文件

ubuntu:
centos:yum install libgcc.i686 glibc-devel.i686 -y
编译:gcc 添加CFLAGS+=-m32

3.-lz

ubuntu:
centos:yum install zlib
